title: TryNinja
author: TryNinja
content: Hi, I need help with a virtual debit/credit card or someone from Argentina which can buy something for me with their local card (put some money on Steam). You won't have to send me the card numbers, of course.PM me!

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: @TryNinja. Does it have to be someone specifically from Argentina?I have a pyypl virtual credit card that I sometimes use for digital payments and purchases from online stores like AliExpress. I could help if it works, though I am not sure about stream payments (never done it before) and also the amount you might need.

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on September 22, 2023, 12:17:47 PM@TryNinja. Does it have to be someone specifically from Argentina?Yes, it has to be from Argentina (issued and in ARS).Steam has regional pricing, so many games are cheaper on Argentina. I just needed to top up the account once with an Argentinian card to activate the account.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: TryNinja on September 22, 2023, 05:28:06 PMYes, it has to be from Argentina (issued and in ARS).Steam has regional pricing, so many games are cheaper on Argentina. I just needed to top up the account once with an Argentinian card to activate the account.Alright then. Sorry that I am not able to help.
